name: Chicken Soup
keywords: carrot, chicken bones, onion, kosher, main course
recipeIngredient: 4 pounds chicken bones, cut in 2-inch pieces
2 small carrots, peeled and cut in chunks
1 small onion, peeled and cut in chunks
1 small turnip, peeled and cut in chunks
1 leek, trimmed, washed and cut in chunks
1/2 small parsnip, peeled and cut in chunks
1/2 cup loosely packed dill sprigs, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients except dill and salt in a 5-quart casserole with a tightly fitting lid. Cook, covered, at 100 percent power in a high-power oven for 40 minutes.
Remove from oven and uncover. Strain through a fine sieve.
Add dill and salt before serving. This soup can be used to poach matzoh balls or for matzoh ball soup.
